title: BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Arbitral Tribunal Indicates Expectation To Be In Position To Issue Award In Summer Of 2020
text:
BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Arbitral Tribunal Indicates Expectation To Be In Position To Issue Award In Summer Of 2020

Stock Markets 15 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 13:07)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Arbitral Tribunal Indicates Expectation To Be In Position To Issue Award In Summer Of 2020 Oct 28 (Reuters) - Cairn Energy PLC : * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - INDIA ARBITRATION UPDATE * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - ARBITRAL TRIBUNAL HAS INDICATED THAT IT EXPECTS TO BE IN A POSITION TO ISSUE AWARD IN SUMMER OF 2020 * CAIRN ENERGY - CONTINUES TO HAVE CONFIDENCE IN MERITS OF ITS CLAIMS IN ARBITRATION AND IS SEEKING FULL RESTITUTION FOR LOSSES OF MORE THAN US$1.4 BILLION

BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Arbitral Tribunal Indicates Expectation To Be In Position To Issue Award In Summer Of 2020
description: BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Arbitral Tribunal Indicates Expectation To Be In Position To Issue Award In Summer Of 2020
